text: Annotate functions with type hints. Use types like list[...] and dict[..., ...] instead of List and Dict from the typing module. For optional types, use the pipe syntax (e.g., int | None).
Use seaborn for plotting. Define title, labels, and pastel palette for style.
Use pandas for data manipulation. Utilize read_csv(), head(), and describe() for data exploration.
Use NumPy for numerical operations. Utilize np.array, np.arange, and np.linspace for creating arrays.
Use Matplotlib for plotting. Set titles, labels, and styles for plots.
Use Jupyter notebooks for interactive coding. Use markdown cells for documentation.
Use Flask for web development. Define routes, templates, and forms for web applications.
Use FastAPI for web development. Define routes, models, and dependencies for web applications.
Use Django for web development. Define models, views, and templates for web applications.
Use SQLAlchemy for database access. Define models, queries, and sessions for database operations.
Use pytest for testing. Define test functions, fixtures, and assertions for unit tests.
Use requests for HTTP requests. Define methods, headers, and parameters for API calls.
Use scikit-learn for machine learning. Define models, features, and metrics for predictive analytics.
Use TensorFlow for deep learning. Define layers, optimizers, and losses for neural networks.
Use Keras for deep learning. Define models, layers, and callbacks for neural networks.
